column4: there is some idiot keeps trying to connect to my ssh how do i stop him
i isntalled fail2ban and denyhosts... how do i know if its working
this chinese guy wont stop connecting i can see it in /var/log/auth.log: sshd[18763]: refused connect from 113.5.32.69 (113.5.32.69)
They'll get a few tries, then it'll get silent.
